# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. We're extending this opportunity to you for $100, considering the value it holds for you personally. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you based on our understanding of your needs and preferences. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to serving you! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer
